name: Shark Pong
description:
What says summer more than a playful shark dancing in the waves by the beach? Bounce the bird and have a good time!

A short project that I put together in two days. Made for a friend of mine based off of his webcomic (*cough cough* it's got toku refs in it, you should read it. *cough cough*).

Feel free to leave a comment with critiques, suggestions, bugs you spotted, and most importantly compliments.
